name: Fuse Club
description: Fuse Club is a legendary techno club known for its top-notch artists and unforgettable nights.

name: Barrio Cafe
description: Barrio Cafe offers an eclectic mix of music and a vibrant atmosphere.

name: C12
description: C12 is an underground venue known for its cutting-edge electronic music.

name: Tour & Taxis
description: Tour & Taxis is a versatile venue hosting a variety of events, including the Voltage Festival.

name: LaVallée
description: LaVallée offers a unique experience with underwater-themed techno parties.

name: Secret Warehouse
description: Secret Warehouse is the place to be for underground techno raves.

name: Beach Club
description: Beach Club combines sun, sand, and techno for an unforgettable beachside party experience.
